availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas P. Mitchell (Mercer County, KY, resident, & Danville, Kentucky, banker)

body.p: Danville, Kentucky, and Mercer County, Kentucky, banker and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Hannah Burton Mitchell. Father of Lucy Mitchell, Minnie Mitchell, and Sallie H. Mitchell. Bank cashier in Danville in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Harrodsburg, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Boyle County, Kentucky, in 1863. Partner with Thomas Barbee in the banking firm of Mitchell & Barbee in 1865. Notary public in Danville in 1865.

ab.bibl:
